title: If evolution is real
body:
Then why haven't we found any transitional fossils?

Or why aren't there millions of species alive now that have partially developed features?

I guess they just magically evolve over night, according to evolutionists.

http://d3gqasl9vmjfd8.cloudfront.net/bff2fb19-164f-4595-b7e7-4e82b9c79f1b.jpg
